```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(irma)
```

```{r}
data <- 
  expand_grid(x=1:3, y=1:3) %>% 
  mutate(n = rpois(n(),10))

data_coord <- data %>% get_all_coordinates(x, y)
```
## Plot

This is a ggplot object. With opinionated defaults...



```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggmosaic_v(data_coord)
```
